allow:
Bash(# Test a wider range of KMS versions
for version in 1 50 60 65 70 100 150 200 250 300 350; do
  echo "Testing KMS version $version:"
  curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/$version/item/2000000" | head -20
  echo "---"
done)

Bash(# Test versions around 300 to find the starting point
for version in 280 290 295 298 299 300 301 310 320 330 340 360 370; do
  echo "Testing KMS version $version:"
  response=$(curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/$version/item/2000000")
  if echo "$response" | grep -q "error"; then
    echo "Error: Not available"
  else
    echo "$response" | jq -r '.description.name' 2>/dev/null || echo "Failed to parse"
  fi
  echo "---"
done)

Bash(# Test the exact starting point
for version in 292 293 294 295; do
  echo "Testing KMS version $version:"
  response=$(curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/$version/item/2000000")
  if echo "$response" | grep -q "error"; then
    echo "Error: Not available"
  else
    echo "Available - Name: $(echo "$response" | jq -r '.description.name' 2>/dev/null)"
  fi
done

echo -e "\n--- Testing multiple items with KMS version 295 ---"
# Test multiple items with version 295
for itemId in 2000000 2000001 2000002 2000003 2000004 2000005; do
  echo -n "Item $itemId: "
  curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/295/item/$itemId" | jq -r '.description.name' 2>/dev/null || echo "Failed"
done)

Bash(# Test higher KMS versions to find the upper limit
for version in 400 450 500 550 600; do
  echo -n "Testing KMS version $version: "
  response=$(curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/$version/item/2000000")
  if echo "$response" | grep -q "error"; then
    echo "Not available"
  else
    echo "Available"
  fi
done

# Test the latest versions
echo -e "\nTesting latest GMS version for comparison:"
curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/GMS/latest/item/2000000" | jq -r '.description.name' 2>/dev/null || echo "Failed")

Bash(# Binary search for upper limit
for version in 380 390 395 398 399; do
  echo -n "Testing KMS version $version: "
  response=$(curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/KMS/$version/item/2000000")
  if echo "$response" | grep -q "error"; then
    echo "Not available"
  else
    echo "Available - $(echo "$response" | jq -r '.description.name' 2>/dev/null)"
  fi
done

# Test if we can get version information or available versions list
echo -e "\nChecking for version list endpoint:"
curl -s "https://maplestory.io/api/wz" | jq '.' 2>/dev/null | head -20)

Bash(git -C ../maple-util-data commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: 장비 상세 정보가 포함된 향상된 CDN 데이터

🎮 새로운 기능:
- 모든 장비에 요구 조건 (레벨, 스탯, 직업) 추가
- 전투 스탯 (공격력, 마력, 방어력) 포함
- 능력치 증가 정보 (STR, DEX, INT, LUK, HP, MP)
- 강화 정보 (업그레이드 슬롯, 고유 아이템)
- 특수 속성 (교환/판매 제한) 정보

📊 데이터:
- 총 57,490개 아이템 (39개 청크)
- 8,299개 몬스터
- 9,993개 맵

🤖 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
